name: Pixel War
description:
The planet was attacked by the enemy! The protective barrier can not hold out alien invaders for long, and only your innate abilities as a fighter can give a chance to save the planet.

Pixel War is a pixel game with various shock effects. It is a flying game, where the player must fight off opponents who become stronger with time. With each wave, the game becomes faster and more difficult. Also all this is flavored with an excellent soundtrack!

★ Try to find out how much you can hold out
★ Choose your strategy for controlling a warship
★ Aliens have different abilities and require an individual approach to their extermination
★ The experience gained in combat will not pass in vain: over time, you improve your skills
★ Controls: WASD control of the ship and mouse for shooting
★ Affordable, minimum price

We wish you happiness! And success!
